Projects Management Module¶

Module that manage the interaction with a models.Project resource

Decorators¶

app_projects.decorators.must_be_owner(method_name)¶

Avoid that a user can edit a project he doesn’t own

app_projects.decorators.no_conflict_of_interests(method_name)¶

Avoid that a user vote a project he own or in which he collaborate

Forms¶

class app_projects.forms.CollaboratorsAddForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

app_projects.models_nn.Collaborations

Models¶

class app_projects.models.Material(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for Material objects, that contains reference to external resources related to a app_projects.models.Project

Description :detailed description of the project
Tumblr :name of the connected Tumblr blog, if any
Flickr :id of the connected Flickr photoset, if any
Youtube1 :id of a youtube video, if any
Youtube2 :id of a youtube video, if any
flickr_add_photo(username, title, description, photo)¶

Upload a photo to Flickr and add it to the connected photoset

flickr_get_photos()¶

Fetch most recent photos from the connected photoset

Returns:a list of photos
flickr_get_url(owner)¶

Getter for the public url of the connected photoset

Returns:the public accessible url of the connected photoset
get_client(username)¶

Getter for the TumblrClient

Returns:a TumblrClient with authentication permission
get_description()¶

Getter for the description of the project

Returns:a string containing the detailed description of the project
tumblr_add_audio(username, source)¶

Post audio to Tumblr

tumblr_add_chat(username, title, conversation)¶

Post chat to Tumblr

tumblr_add_link(username, title, url)¶

Post link to Tumblr

tumblr_add_photo(username, source, data)¶

Post photo to Tumblr

tumblr_add_quote(username, quote)¶

Post quote to Tumblr

tumblr_add_text(username, title, body)¶

Post text to Tumblr

tumblr_get_posts()¶

Fetch most recent posts from the connected blog

Returns:a list of blog posts
wrapper()¶

Return a wrapper for a Material object, i.e. a dictionary with elem=true if the project has that piece of material

youtube_get_videos()¶

Getter for the ids of the Youtube videos

class app_projects.models.Project(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for a Project, one of the main resources

Owner :app_users.models.UserProfile that own the project
Category :the Category which the project belongs
Title :title of the project
Summary :short summary of the project
Start_date :date in which the project was started
End_date :date in which the project ended, if empty still ongoing
Website :external website of the project
Material :app_projects.models.Material connected to the project
can_unvote(user)¶

Check if the current user can unvote (must have voted before)

can_vote(user)¶

Check if the current user can vote (must not have voted before)

delete_collaborator(username)¶

Delete the collaborators with the specified username

delete_collaborators()¶

Delete all the collaborations relationships

delete_material()¶

Delete all the connected material

get_category_complete()¶

Return a tuple of category id and category name

get_category_verbose()¶

Return the complete name of the category

get_collaborators()¶

Fetch all the collaborators of the project

get_collaborators_wrapper()¶

Fetch all the collaborators of the project, and return their wrappers

get_material()¶

Return the Material object connected to the project

get_material_extended()¶

Return a wrapper around all the extra-informations stored in the connected Material

  • description
  • flickr photos (via API call)
  • tumblr posts (via API call)
  • youtube videos
get_material_wrapper()¶

Return the wrapper of the Material object connected to the project

get_owner()¶

Getter for the owner

get_owner_wrapper()¶

Getter for the wrapper of the owner

get_votes()¶

Return the number of votes obtained from the project

unvote(user)¶

Remove a vote from the project

vote(user)¶

Add a vote to the project

wrapper()¶

Return a wrapper for a Project object, i.e. a dictionary containing all the data

class app_projects.models_nn.Collaborations(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for a Collaboration, a many-to-many relationship between projects (app_projects.models.Project) and users (app_users.models.UserProfile)

Project :the project of interest
Userprofile :the users that collaborates to the project
Date_joined :date in which the collaborator joined the project
wrapper()¶

Return a wrapper for a Collaborations object, i.e. a dictionary containing the wrappers of the involved objects

class app_projects.models_nn.Votes(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for a Vote, a many-to-many relationship between projects (app_projects.models.Project) and users (app_users.models.UserProfile)

Project :the project of interest
Users :the users that have voted the project

Views¶

class app_projects.views.ProjectViews¶

View that manage access to the service that handles projects

Supported_formats :
 html, json
Template_path :path to html files
browse_by_category(request)¶

List all projects grouped by Category

Rest Types:GET
Url :^category(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Note

accessible also to non-registered users

browse_by_votes(request)¶

List all projects grouped by the range of Votes

Rest Types:GET
Url :^votes(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Note

accessible also to non-registered users

collaborators_delete(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Remove collaborator from a project

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/collaborators/delete/(?P<username>\w+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
collaborators_manage(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Manage collaborators of the project (add/remove)

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/collaborators(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
create(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Receive data from the form of new() and create the new project

Decorators :rest_login_required
Rest Types:POST
Url :^(?:$|index.(html|json)$)
destroy(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Destroy a project and all the connected data

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, DELETE
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/destroy(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
edit(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Edit the basic informations of a project

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :'^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/edit(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
flickr_add(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post a new photo to the connected Flickr photoset

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/flickr/add(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
index(request, projects_set=None, title=None, messages=None)¶

List all projects in alphabetical order

Rest Types:GET
Url :^(?:$|index.(html|json)$)

Note

accessible also to non-registered users

list_by_category(request, category)¶

List all projects belonging to the category specified

Rest Types:GET
Url :^category/(?P<category>\w+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Note

accessible also to non-registered users

list_by_votes(request, min_votes, max_votes)¶

List all projects with a number of votes belonging to the range specified

Rest Types:GET
Url :^votes/(?P<min_votes>[0-9]+)/(?P<max_votes>[0-9]+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Note

accessible also to non-registered users

material(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Manage the Material connected to the project (add/edit/remove)

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/material(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
new(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Render the form for create a new project

Decorators :rest_login_required
Rest Types:GET
Url :^new(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
replace(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Replace the basic informations of a project

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:PUT
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
show(request, id, messages=None, errors=None)¶

Show a app_projects.models.Project with all its informations

  • standard informations

  • material: connected app_projects.models.Material object

  • owner

  • collaborators

  • privileges of the current users
    • is_owner: True if the user is the owner
    • is_collaborator: True if the user is a collaborator
    • can_vote: True if the user can vote the project
    • can_unvote: True if the user can un-vote the project
Rest Types:GET
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Note

accessible also to non-registered users

tumblr_audio(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post an audio blogpost to the connected Tumblr blog

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/tumblr/audio(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
tumblr_chat(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post a chat blogpost to the connected Tumblr blog

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/tumblr/chat(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
tumblr_link(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post a link blogpost to the connected Tumblr blog

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/tumblr/link(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
tumblr_photo(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post a photo blogpost to the connected Tumblr blog

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/tumblr/photo(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
tumblr_quote(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post a quote blogpost to the connected Tumblr blog

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/tumblr/quote(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
tumblr_text(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post a text blogpost to the connected Tumblr blog

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/tumblr/text(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
unvote(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

If the user can un-vote (he is not connected to the project, and he has already voted for it), then delete the Vote

Decorators :rest_login_required, no_conflict_of_interests
Rest Types:POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/unvote(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
update(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Update the basic informations of a project

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_owner
Rest Types:PATCH
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
vote(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

If the user can vote (he is not connected to the project, and he has not already voted for it), then create a new Vote

Decorators :rest_login_required, no_conflict_of_interests
Rest Types:POST
Url :^(?P<id>[0-9]+)/vote(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
